snippet: Loyd, who could be the top pick, is eligible under W.N.B.A. rules to turn pro early because she will turn 22 during the calendar year of the draft.
abstract: Notre Dame junior Jewell Loyd declares herself eligible for WNBA draft, which is set for April 16; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Loyd, who could be the top pick, is eligible under W.N.B.A. rules to turn pro early because she will turn 22 during the calendar year of the draft.

headline.main: Jewell Loyd of Notre Dame Declares for Draft
